forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As night unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the air is cool and crisp, with the city’s skyline sparkling against a backdrop of mostly clear skies. The temperature hovers around a pleasant 49 degrees, inviting a gentle north wind that whispers through the streets. Tonight, the absence of fog allows a breathtaking view of the glittering city lights, revealing the shimmering outline of the Golden Gate Bridge just beyond the hills—a stark contrast to the usual curtain of fog. This clarity foreshadows a sunny Tuesday, perfect for those eager to embrace the outdoors.

Tomorrow promises a delightful day, with temperatures peaking near 63 degrees but gradually cooling as afternoon approaches. A light breeze from the north-northeast will keep the day refreshingly cool, ideal for a leisurely stroll through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods or perhaps a quiet moment at one of the many charming cafes. Dress in layers to adapt to the ebb and flow of warmth, opting for a light jacket and comfortable shoes to explore the cobbled streets with ease. As the day wraps into evening, consider settling into a cozy spot with a cup of coffee, watching as the city transforms once more into a tapestry of lights, etched against the deepening sky.
